text: Oreta sambongsana is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Kyu- Tek Park, Minyoung Kim, Young-Dae Kwon and Eun-Mi Ji in 2011. It is found in Korea.Park, K.-T.; Kim, M.; Kwon, Y.-D. & Ji, E.-M. (2011) "A review of the genus Oreta Walker in Korea, with description of a new species (Lepidoptera: Drepanidae)". Journal of Asia-Pacific Entomology. 14 (3): 311-316. ==References== Category:Moths described in 2011 Category:Drepaninae
title: Oreta sambongsana
